snippet: Generic creams routinely prescribed by doctors have been undergoing rapid price increases, an example of the murky and often illogical world of drug pricing.
abstract: Generic creams routinely prescribed by doctors for rashes and other skin disorders have been undergoing rapid price increases, an example of the murky and often illogical world of drug pricing; increases for some creams range from 100 percent to 300 percent over three years, and have stumped doctors and their patients.
lead_paragraph: Generic creams routinely prescribed by doctors have been undergoing rapid price increases, an example of the murky and often illogical world of drug pricing.

headline.seo: Prescription Skin Creams Jump in Price
headline.main: Soaring Ointment Prices Are a Dermatologic Mystery
